item.title: Opinionatedgit
item.description: Opinionated Git Should I rebase or merge A very common question is “Should I merge or should I rebase?”. Always do rebases. It makes your history look prettier. For a more in-depth look at the difference between the two approaches please read merge vs. rebase by Edward Thomson. Should I use submodules for dependencies No, use a proper dependency management tool! Also note that subtree and subrepo should be avoided.
